Description: Make your entrance into the wonderful world of programming with Python!
You will learn Object-oriented programming (OOP) that is a method of structuring a program by bundling related properties and behaviors into individual objects.
Combine your Python programming knowledge with your GUI design by using PYQT-5
You will learn to store data securely and use it whenever you want. (SQL/ NonSQL)

Topic: Web Scraping, HTTP Request and API's
Description: You will learn to scrape information from the internet and use this information (Beautiful Soup, Selenium, Scrapy)
You will earn the basic statistical information to use when processing data.
You will learn about Exploratory Data Analysis or (EDA) that is understanding the data sets by summarizing their main characteristics often plotting them visually.(NumP, Pandas)
You will learn about Data Visualization that plays an essential role in the representation of both small and large-scale data.(Matplotlib, Plotly, Seaborn)
Get the key element of Supervised and Unsupervised learning.
Learn Recommender systems (RS) that have evolved into a fundamental tool for helping users make informed decisions and choices.
Let's bring it all together: combine your forces to build a data science project!
Collect your certification to became data scientist!
